summary: It's All Hallow's Eve. A trio of costumed misfits with very special dietary requirements seizes a Mexican cantina and force the staff to engage in a late night of gaming, food and libations. The only caveat is what's on the menu.
cast: Michael Weston|Jimmi Simpson|Sutton Foster|Lily Cole|Molly Ephraim|Paul Rodriguez|Lothaire Bluteau|Ethan Sandler|Gabriel Luna|Gabourey Sidibe|Sarah Silverman|Stefanie E. Frame|Kate Rogal|Dul√© Hill|James Roday Rodriguez
director: Director: James Roday Rodriguez (as James Roday)
title: Gravy
